answers.answer: I have never had gestational diabetes, but if it helps I'm 5'0" and gave birth 3 times with no meds. My last baby was 8 lbs and 8 oz.

I was 19 when I had my first will be 23 with this one... im 5'1 dont worry hun your body is built to do this.. I did tair a bit but that was because my mom and bf were so excited to see the babies head that they yelled at me to push and I did.. the doc didn't have time to really do his thing and try to prevent it. Just listen to them and relax!  You will be fine

I was 14 & 4' 11" when I had my first believe me I was tiny....and I delivered my baby just fine! Don't stress, your body will adjust and is built to handle it. I'm 19 still same height with my second child. It's gonna be okay (:
Thanks! These comments make me feel a bit better (:

question: I'm only 19 and I'm 4"11. On top of that I've got gestational diabetes. I'm getting worried that my body won't be able to handle all this weight and that something may go wrong. Is anyone else in my position?
title: Who else is worried about giving birth for the 1st time?
